陖字的基本解释

陖
jùn
古同“峻”，山高而陡；严厉。

陖字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jùn］
［《廣韻》私閏切，去稕，心。］
同“峻1”。
(1)山高而陡。
(2)严厉。
(3)深刻，艰深。

陖字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【阜字部】　陖； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1351第01
【唐韻】私閏切【集韻】須閏切，?音浚。【說文】陗高也。【玉篇】險也。　又【玉篇】亦作峻。【司馬相如·上林賦】徑陖赴險。【前漢書】作峻。　又【廣韻】亭名，在馮翊。　【集韻】同埈。【篇海】亦作??。

陖字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
陖字的起名意思

暂无。

Phoenix
Basic explanation of words
Phoenix
jùn
Ancient Tong is "severe", the mountain is high and steep; it is severe.
Phoenix
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jùn］
["Guangyun" privately cut, go to 稕, heart. ]
Same as "Jun 1".
(1) The mountain is high and steep.
(2) Stern.
(3) Profound and difficult.
Phoenix
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集】【Fu Character Department】　陖; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1351 No. 01
[Tang Yun] private run-cut [Ji Yun] beard run-cut,? Yin Jun. [Speaking text] Que Gao also. [Jade articles] Risk too.　[Jade Chapter] Also made Jun. 【Sima Xiangru·Shanglin Fu】Going to danger. [Pre-Han Shu] Zuo Jun.　[Guangyun] The name of the pavilion, in Feng Yi.　【Jiyun】Same as 埈. [Pianhai] also made??.
